Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-64324 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 1.5.3-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-64324 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 1.5.3-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package kubevirt is earlier than 1.5.3-3, affected by CVE-2025-64324
